rooms.description: The entrance hall is located in the North-facing section to adhere to Vastu principles, ensuring positive energy flow.
Spacious living area with high ceilings and large windows to provide ample natural light. The design follows Chettinad style aesthetics with intricate detailing.
Separate dining area adjacent to the living room for formal gatherings.
Spacious master bedroom with private ensuite bathroom and ample storage. South-west corner placement adheres to Vastu principles.
Cozy guest bedroom with natural ventilation and sunlight.
A dedicated study area with sufficient space for a desk and shelves, designed in the Chettinad style.
Modern kitchen designed with functionality and traditional Chettinad elements, featuring a window for natural light and ventilation.
A compact space for storage, laundry, or additional kitchen support.

openings.description: Main entrance on the north side to invite positive energy, ensuring a welcoming and auspicious entry as per Vastu.
Multiple windows strategically placed to maximize natural light while ensuring privacy.

additional_features.description: A well-integrated swimming pool on the property grounds designed to complement the Chettinad aesthetic.
Dedicated home theater space for entertainment, complete with acoustic design.

levels.notes: This design emphasizes a blend of modern functionality and traditional Chettinad style. The north-facing entrance is key for aligning with Vastu principles. All dimensions are approximate and subject to further site-specific modifications.
